search.title: Field-Specific Search
search.description: You can search for specific pack fields using two different operators: colon (:) for partial matches and equals (=) for exact matches.

examples.title: Available Fields
examples.nameField: Search by pack name (e.g., 'name:my pack' or 'name=My Cool Pack')
examples.ownerField: Search by pack owner username (e.g., 'ownerUsername:v0w4n' or 'ownerUsername=v0w4n')
examples.levelIdField: Search for packs containing a specific level (e.g., 'levelId:123' or 'levelId=456')
examples.viewModeField: Search by pack visibility mode (e.g., 'viewMode:0' for public packs)
examples.pinnedField: Search by pinned status (e.g., 'pinned:true' for pinned packs)

operators.title: Search Operators
operators.description: You can combine multiple search conditions using operators.

examples.title: Operator Examples
examples.and: Search for packs that match both conditions (AND). This will look for packs named 'my pack' owned by 'v0w4n'
examples.or: Search for packs that match either condition (OR). This searches for either exact 'My Pack' or any pack with 'cool pack' in the name
examples.complex: Complex search combining AND and OR conditions. This looks for pinned packs by 'teo_72' or any packs by 'v0w4n'
examples.not: Usage of '\!' will exclude results containing the term - this expression will exclude pinned packs with 'cool' in the name

viewModes.title: View Mode Values
viewModes.description: Pack visibility modes control who can see your pack.

examples.title: View Mode Examples
examples.public: Public - Everyone can see and search for this pack
examples.linkOnly: Link Only - Only visible with direct link, not in search results
examples.private: Private - Only the owner can see this pack

points.caseSensitive: Searches are case-insensitive - 'PACK' and 'pack' will give the same results
points.partial: Colon (:) allows partial matches - 'name:cool' will match 'My Cool Pack'
points.spaces: Spaces are allowed in search terms - 'name:my cool pack' works
points.order: The order of conditions doesn't matter within each group
points.boolean: Boolean values like 'pinned:true' or 'pinned:false' work for true/false fields
